extendedInfo.description: TV.com brings personal TV to your phone on WiFi and cellular networks.  Access the videos you want anywhere you go including full episodes...and itâs free! Get video from CBS, The CW, CNET, ET, Showtime, CBS News, CBS Sports and much more! Watch your favorite shows anywhere, anytime on TV.com. No subscription fees apply.

reviews.title: Needs more full episodes
reviews.comment: I enjoy watching the shows but would be glad to rate higher if it had full episodes of criminal minds and more ncis. It doesn\'t have enough full episodes of primetime shows
reviews.author: Charity Murray

reviews.title: Ok... guess its the best available for now!
reviews.comment: This site is ok, it would be better if there was more programming for the other channels listed, if there were it would be great... also I understand you probably need commercials for funding but they just cut in, usually right in the middle of a sentence... not cool! Not cool at all!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The amount of full episodes has drastically decreased.
reviews.comment: This app is going downhill big time. 1* until you get your act together. If you haven\'t installed it don\'t bother.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not so great anymore.
reviews.comment: I have to say not as impressed as I was when I first downloaded this app. First problem is too much soap episodes. Second game shows and talk show which I think hurts this app. I downloaded it to keep up with shows like CSI, CSI: NY, NCIS and Blue Bloods. Unless you guys correct this might be uninstalling it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Use to buffer like every forty five minuts now its like every ten secs and I have the connection I hallways had pleas fix and will rate higher thanks
reviews.author: steven johnston

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This is the best TV app out there.  No problems at all, sound and picture are steady and clear.   I love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really good!
reviews.comment: Latest upgrade much more stable and works great. I\'m enjoying CSI and old Star Trek, wish it had more current CBS shows like Big Bang Theory.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Confused
reviews.comment: I downloaded this app which works great for the 6 shows that I can actually see. After reading other reviews I realize others can see a lot more than I can. I have a pretty good selection from a list of all shows and they even show up in a green box with a play symbol but when I click on it I get a blank white screen. Help please!         only see about
reviews.author: Selina Kirkland

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: So what if I can watch a few episodes of Price is Right? Does anyone really want to watch hundreds of 1-2 min clips? I really don\'t see the point. CBS, try again.
reviews.author: Sophia Petrillo

reviews.title: Need recent episodes
reviews.comment: This is a great app. I try to watch CBS shows that I miss. For some reason this season they seem to be behind on uploading episodes.  Previously i could count on them being loaded the next day by that is not happening the fall!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too many soap operas and late night shows
reviews.comment: It seems Al there is on are soaps and late night talk shows. Also, the lists are all messed up. Quality is great, just quantity is lacking.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really easy to use!!
reviews.comment: This is a great app. Easy to install and easy to use. I just wish there was more chanels and more full length shows to pick from.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used to love it
reviews.comment: Loved it on my EVO. On my Samsung Galaxy S3, it just starts to load and goes back to the available episodes screen. Does it require Flash Player? If so don\'t blame the app blame Android and the Flash Player people for not being able to get along. I see it works on some galaxies. How do I get it to work on mine?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worked good before last update
reviews.comment: I would of given the app 4 stars but sense last update your lucky to get 1 star can\'t watch any full episodes they either wont play jumping to episode before it then jumps back to home screen or in the middle of any part of an episode gets about halfway then jumps to previous episode please fix
reviews.author: cyrus hottenstein

reviews.title: The app is pretty good
reviews.comment: Pretty good but it could use a lot more full episodes
reviews.author: Ed Keeney

reviews.title: App is a real p.o.s.
reviews.comment: This app is complete frustration. Every time u try to watch an episode it forces u to watch a long commercial. At the end of the commercial u are redirected back to the list...so u get to watch the commercial again. If u ever get something to play do not try to use the controls or u r back to the commercial. Don\'t waste your time on this garbage.
reviews.author: Charles David

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Would like to see more full episodes of the good wife and vegas. Make this happen and I rate it 5 stars! I love this app
reviews.author: Marcelo Rodriguez

reviews.title: Still not working properly on Android 4.0.x devices
reviews.comment: Clicking on the channel name (CBS), then on \"all shows\" - only lists a single show - presumably the first in the list (\"2 broke girls\" at the moment). Been like this through android 3.x, 4.0.3 and new device running 4.0.4 - about 14 months of trying!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Way more free episodes now
reviews.comment: I had uninstalled this and was just checking in for something to watch.  Pleasantly to find way more variety and smooth streaming.  Same technology when you watch TMZ Live on it\'s respective app.  Well done.  Five stars will come with more sitcoms.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Would like Full,updated episodes.
reviews.comment: I like this but it would be nice to see the full episode of a show uploaded everyday. The picture quality could use some improvement.  Please fix this and i\'ll give it 5 stars.
reviews.author: Donna Norris
